Articles.Content:
Hi all, I've made a spreadsheet which for use with KSP and USI Life Support.  It fills in details and tells you how much dV you need, how much supplies and how much habitation etc.

Im not 100% sure the workings out for the Supplies and Habitation parts are correct - just wondering if anyone who is familiar with them could check it out and let me know:

 

https://www.dropbox.com/s/9na1xot334rypzh/ksp%20trip%20planner.xlsx?dl=0

 

Thanks!

Ah, you reached the Excel Threshold already?

It's the point where a game requires so much number-crunching that you have to resort to spreadsheets to manage it.
Haha yeah I guess, was getting sick of writing the same numbers down all the time so wanted a bit of automation!
Planning to play wit USI-LS come 1.1, so this should be very useful!  Thank you for sharing your hard work.  (I tried something along these lines for TAC, gave up, too many resources...)
